20-005SC.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, January 23, 2020.Attachments: SCC Minutes 1-23-20.pdfSCC Minutes 1-23-20.pdfA motion was made by Commissioner Gonzales, seconded by Commissioner Novak, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Coby Skye and Sona CoffeeAbstain: 1 - Carla DillonAbsent: 4 - Hilda Gaytan, Nicholas Lind, Alan Tolkoff and Morgan WheelerPage 2 of 9CITY COUNCIL CHAMBERS411 WEST OCEAN BOULEVARDLONG BEACH, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, FEBRUARY 27, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTES2.
